languages.text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} этим мечом, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, а цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −3 к тем же {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, the wielder gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, while the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Нанося урон этим мечом, персонаж получает бонус +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, а цель получает штраф −3 к тем же характеристикам до конца боя.

Нанося урон этим мечом, персонаж получает бонус +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, а цель получает штраф −3 к тем же характеристикам до конца боя.

languages.text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
languages.original_text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} этим мечом, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, а цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −3 к тем же {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder deals damage to the target with this sword, the wielder gets +5 WS/BS/TGH/STR, and the target suffers −5 WS/BS/TGH/STR until the end of combat. Stacks.

If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, the wielder gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, while the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用这把战刀造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}都会提高3点，而目标相应{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低3点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用这把战刀造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}都会提高3点，而目标相应{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低3点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: 使い手がこの剣でターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた場合、使い手は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}に+3の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得るが、ターゲットは戦闘終了まで同じ{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に−3の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使い手がこの剣でターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた場合、使い手は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}に+3の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得るが、ターゲットは戦闘終了まで同じ{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に−3の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al objetivo con esta espada, hasta el final del combate gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +3 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, mientras que el objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −3 a las mismas {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al objetivo con esta espada, hasta el final del combate gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +3 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, mientras que el objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −3 a las mismas {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.

languages.text: Fügt der Träger dem Ziel mit diesem Schwert {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +3 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffen-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. Das Ziel erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −3 auf diese {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt der Träger dem Ziel mit diesem Schwert {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +3 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffen-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. Das Ziel erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −3 auf diese {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à sa cible avec cette épée, jusqu'à la fin du combat, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +3, tandis qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −3 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} correspondantes de la cible.
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à sa cible avec cette épée, jusqu'à la fin du combat, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +3, tandis qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −3 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} correspondantes de la cible.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi; bu kılıçla hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanırken hedef ise aynı niteliklerine 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
